thread.title: Bird Goon
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Bird Goon

author: Bird Goon
title: Bird Goon
text: Eagle Optics carries a full complement of top-of-the-line optics. Recently shopped for a spotting scope and the saleswoman was very knowledgeable and helpful. No pressure. We spent more than an hour in the shop, looking through all the scope options, we never felt hurried in any way. Prices are basically the same as on line. There is not really another place that could be better in my opinion.
